div.head: 嘔逆酸水
div.div: vomiting with counterflow of sour water

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: vomiting with counterflow of sour water

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with ou tu suan shui 嘔吐酸水 , vomiting of sour water. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry yang shi 羊屎 quotes Bing bu shou ji 兵部手集 : 療無故嘔逆酸水不止，或吐三五口，食後如此 方 , “Use this recipe after meals for treating unending vomiting with counterflow of sour water that cannot be explained, or if someone vomits three to five times”.
